text: Can suck in the belly button while you actively feel it. Can imagine a white energy ball of light all around you to protect. Now to cleanse- Can use sea salt to wash off with in shower - a handful and brush from top to bottoms of arms, legs, torso. Can also play “angelic” type music or chants- Tibetan singing bowls- whatever spiritual type music to raise your vibration. Can read about sound healing and the like- Good luck. Sounds like they need to smudge that office.
